sourcesContent:
/*! ========================================================= * Argon Dashboard React - v1.2.1 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-react * Copyright 2021 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/argon-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ // reactstrap components import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormGroup, Form, Input, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, InputGroup, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; // reactstrap components import { NavLink } from "reactstrap"; import axios from "axios"; import { browserHistory, Redirect } from "react-router"; const Login = () => { return ( <> {localStorage.getItem("userInfo") && ( )}
Sign in with credentials
login(e)}>
e.preventDefault()} > Forgot password? e.preventDefault()} > Create Account ); }; function login(e) { e.preventDefault(); const request = { email: document.getElementById("email").value, password: document.getElementById("password").value, }; console.log(request); axios .post("http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login", request) .then((res) => { if (res.data.message == "Sucessfully Logged In") { localStorage.setItem("userInfo", res.data.token); window.location.replace("/admin/index"); } else { alert(res.data.message); } }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); e.target.reset(); } export default Login;
